text: The 1943 New York Giants season was the franchise's 61st season. The team finished in eighth place in the National League with a 55–98 record, 49½ games behind the St. Louis Cardinals. == Offseason == == Regular season == === Season standings === === Record vs. opponents === === Opening Day lineup === === Roster === {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !
